name: A Tower Defense Game
description:
This is an unbalanced tower defense game in early development. It's made by only one person and it's not so good. It has only ~20 rounds, so you need to reset the game to try other towers. I know that there are some bugs, but i hope that they will not disturb you. Also feel free to suggest other background music if you don't like it and please tell me what would i change to make the game more balanced.

Useful buttons:

Pressing digit 0 Restarts the game,

Pressing digit 1 gives you 100,000$.

There are 7 types of enemies: common, strong, fast, made of iron, made of glass and mini-bosses. There also are disguised versions of every type of them, so don't be confused when some tower won't target them.

Please excuse any mistakes as English is my second language.

Music: www.bensound.com
